features.title: Rounder borders
features.desc: Card-like elements will now have rounded corners instead of sharp corners.

features.title: Shadow mode
features.desc: Shadow mode was introduced, with it, you can build a single dashboard and mold it to serve for thousands of different users.

features.title: Dashboard Search
features.desc: Use the dashboard search to quickly filter dashboards directly in the sidebar. This will help you quicly filter things.
